title: Welcome Tour
description: A brief tour introducing the user to the platform

conversation.message: Welcome to Mosaic! I'm your guide to creating meaningful digital memorials. Would you like to see what's possible?

It's simple! We'll have a conversation about your loved one, and I'll help you create different memorial objects like timelines, galleries, or story collections. These can be shared with family and friends. What would you like to create today?
Here's an example of what a complete memorial looks like. It contains several objects created by family and friends that capture different aspects of a person's life and legacy.
Would you like to start creating your own memorial now?
Great! Let's get started on your memorial journey. I'm here to guide you through each step of the process.
